file_content.text: Lady... I... sorry....
This can't be. Um, I'm sorry I ordered him to kill you, Sith. I hope you don't hold it against me.
You see I've been fending off Duke Kendoh's advances for some time, and I just assumed you were here for him.
If you're not working for the duke, I--I'll gladly cooperate. You--you mentioned a--a--a girl, yes? Jaesa someone?
Jaesa Willsaam. Kendoh told me she used to be your handmaid.
Pay attention this time.
I--if the duke didn't send you, I'm happy to help. You mentioned a--a--a girl that left with a Jedi, right?
Kendoh said you used to have a Force-sensitive handmaiden.
That's right.
Kendoh is a liar.
Glad to see I have your undivided attention.
Oh, now you're ready to help.
You have a very persuasive manner.
My patience has just about run out.
You had your chance.
N--no, wait! Give me a moment.
I was aware of the young handmaiden who left Alderaan with a Jedi Master.
And I did hear the name Jaesa Willsaam, but you're mistaken--I didn't know her. The girl never served me.
But I'm afraid you're mistaken--the girl never served me. I didn't know her.
Lying to me would be a very big mistake.
That better be true.
Duke Kendoh will be able to discover if she's lying.
It seems I've been misinformed.
Then I'm mistaken.
I'm sure Duke Kendoh will double his efforts to help you find what you seek.
Do you know anything about her?
Tell me what you can.
Duke Kendoh can include that in his interrogations.
The duke congratulates you on your impressive venture into House Alde. I'm here to take the fair lady to him.
No! Don't let him take me to that... that pig.
I do know who the girl worked for. I'll tell you all I can, if only you'll keep me from Duke Kendoh.
Don't leave anything out.
Be thorough.
All right, I'm going to trust that you'll be honorable.
I'm listening.
Then we are agreed. Good.
You'd say anything to save your neck.
How can I trust you?
I promise you--judge once you've heard.
Before she left with the Jedi, Jaesa Willsaam was the handmaiden of Gesselle Organa of House Organa. They were inseparable.
The girl's name is Jaesa Willsaam, and she was a handmaiden of Gesselle Organa of House Organa. She was always by her side.
Before the war, Gesselle was an aristocrat like myself. Now, she leads the Organan troops against House Ulgo.
Where exactly is this Gesselle Organa?
Tell me how to find her.
H--her headquarters are somewhere on the front line.
That's not a lot to go on.
That doesn't tell me much.
But that--that's as close as I can get you to Jaesa. Gesselle can tell you the rest.
That's an excellent lead, thank you.
Much appreciated.
Oh. A mannered Sith. How... refreshing. You're welcome.
The duke will know where to find Gesselle Organa and how to reach her.
If you let me deliver Lady Renata to him, I'm sure Kendoh will happily shed light on the situation for you.
The lady isn't going anywhere.
She stays.
Thank you. It's good to know some Sith have a sense of honor.
Fine. As I said, I will not oppose you, nor will I defy your decision here.
I'm afraid I'm forced to hand you over to Kendoh.
Sorry, Renata.
I never intended to keep her safe.
Take her.
I thought by telling you what I know, you'd show mercy!
Your destiny lies with the duke, woman. Be nice to him and maybe he'll treat you well.
I meant what I said. I'm sure Kendoh can help you find and confront Gesselle. You should consult with him on it.
Be sure he's prepared when I get there.
Tell him to expect me.
Of course, friend. I will see you at House Thul.
I'll do just that.
Sounds good.
I will update Kendoh so he is ready for you.
Keep your opinions to yourself, Sith.
Shut up.
I was only trying to help you.
Despite the destruction you caused, I hold you in high esteem, Sith.
I only hope you make that worm Kendoh pay for misleading you. Take nothing he says at face value.
I see through Duke Kendoh.
He doesn't fool me.
I'll take that to heart.
I'm sure you'll be fine.
Goodbye.
Goodbye.
Come, Renata. Time to face your fate.
And a terrible fate it will be.
My lady, we have intruder.
Lady Renata, I seek the family of your former handmaiden, Jaesa Willsaam.
Your former handmaiden.
Lady Renata, you had a handmaiden who left Alderaan with a Jedi. I seek her family.
Your former handmaiden.
What's this nonsense you're spouting? I don't know what you're talking about.
Lady, let me kill this Sith like the last one Duke Kendoh sent.
Windredd, you don't need my permission to kill an enemy that comes barging through my door. Make it fast.
Stand down, Windredd, or you're dead.
Attack me and die.
Sith got it wrong. I make you dead.
Violence isn't necessary. I just need information.
You've got it wrong.
All you need is my sword through you neck.
Let me save you the trouble!
I'll make it fast! [Attack]
This Sith faster than last one.
